Name: Hermit Home Designer
About the game: Yamasen-Chan's Hermit Home Designer is a hikikomori themed visual novel and designing game. Yamasen-Chan is a hikikomori who lives in isolation and never leaves her home. She really wants her home to look great! Will you help her make a stylish and comfy home? Features: 6 unique homes to design Complete Visual Novel Narrative Over 100 items to design with Original Soundtrack
